Public Class TableLayoutPanel Inherits Panel Implements IExtenderProvider
public ref class TableLayoutPanel : System::Windows::Forms::Panel, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider
type TableLayoutPanel = class inherit Panel interface IExtenderProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("System.Windows.Forms.Design.TableLayoutPanelCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示一个面板，它可以在一个由行和列组成的网格中对其内容进行动态布局。

span.span: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将其内容排列在网格中。The control arranges its contents in a grid. 由于布局是同时在设计时和运行时执行的，因此它可随应用程序环境的变化而动态地变化。Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes. 这使得面板中的控件能够按比例调整大小，以便能够响应更改（例如父控件的大小调整或本地化产生的文本长度更改）。This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization. 任何 Windows 窗体控件均可以是 控制的子控件，包括 的其他实例。Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the control, including other instances of . 这样，你可以构造适应在运行时更改的复杂的布局。This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime. 添加新控件时， 控件可扩展以容纳新控件，具体取决于 、 和 属性的值。The control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the , , and properties. 将 或 属性的值设置为 0 指定将取消 在相应方向的绑定。Setting either the or property to a value of 0 specifies that the will be unbound in the corresponding direction. 在 控件充满子控件后，还可控制扩展的方向（水平或垂直）。You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the control is full of child controls. 默认情况下， 控件通过添加行向下扩展。By default, the control expands downward by adding rows. 如果需要使行和列的行为不同于默认行为，可以通过使用 和 属性来控制行和列的属性。If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the and properties. 可分别设置行或列的属性。You can set the properties of rows or columns individually. 控件将以下属性添加到其子控件中：`Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan` 和 `RowSpan`。The control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`. 可以通过设置子控件上的 `ColumnSpan` 或 `RowSpan` 属性来合并 控件中的单元格。You can merge cells in the control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，和`RowSpan`属性在运行时，使用， ， ， ，和方法。To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the , , , , and methods. > > 若要读取`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，和`RowSpan`属性在运行时，使用， ， ， ，和方法。To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the , , , , and methods. 子控件的停靠行为等同于其他容器控件。The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls. 中的子控件的锚定行为与其他容器控件中的行为不同。The anchoring behavior of child controls in a differs from the behavior in other container controls. 如果子控件的值属性设置为或、 将针对该单元格的左或向右边框放置控件、 离的距离，是的控件的总和属性和面板的属性。If the value of the child control's property is set to or , the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's property and the panel's property. 如果这两个和设置值，该控件将大小调整为该单元格的宽度与和考虑在内的值。If both the and values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the and values taken into account. 行为和锚定相当。The behavior for and anchoring is analogous. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 定位点和停靠子控件，在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md). 如果你需要模拟其他容器控件中的默认锁定行为的子控件，你可以调整和属性，以保持该控件的边框和单元格的边框之间的距离常量。If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the and properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border. 设置的值`Column`和`Row`为-1 子控件的属性将导致控件移动到的第一个空白单元格控件。Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the control. 从左到右、 从上到下，将在搜索中，将继续选择空单元格。The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom. 此顺序是依赖于区域性的因此它将从右到左 (RTL) 布局中正确运行。This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts. > [!NOTE] > 具有的唯一控件属性设置为`true`参与控件的布局计算。Only controls that have the property set to `true` participate in the control's layout computations. 另请参见：Also see: - [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中对齐和拉伸控件How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md) - [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中跨行和跨列How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md) - [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中编辑行和列How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md) - [演练：使用 TableLayoutPanel 在 Windows 窗体上排列控件Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来创建一个单元格的自定义外观。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to create a custom appearance for a cell. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此值将导致重绘自己和其内容面板。Setting this value will cause the panel to redraw itself and its contents. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的值具体取决于所选属性。The following code example sets the value of the property depending on the selected . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TableLayoutPanel1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TableLayoutPanel1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#561](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#561)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#561](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#561)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表中列的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.
The number of columns in the control.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以同时指定和属性与已知的和固定大量的单元格的布局。You can specify both the and the properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells. 你还可以指定一个属性或其他如果你希望你的布局不断增长中的单元格的数目假定属性允许这种增长。You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the property allows for such growth. 如果值为 0，面板会通过添加行，并且如果的值为 0，面板会通过添加列。If the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns. 指定使用的面板增长属性优于设置或为 0，但是。Specifying panel growth with the property is preferred to setting or to 0, however. 控件可以添加或删除从表使用属性。Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnStyles As TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection

summary.span: 获取 的列样式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of column styles for the .

value.span: 包含 控件中每个列的 的 。

span.span: A containing a for each column in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问的样式属性的特定列。Use the property to access the style properties of specific columns. 你可以使用的成员类来设置表中的各列的特性。You can use members of the class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table. 当控件排列其列时，它将优先级分配给每个按以下顺序：When the control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each in the following order: 1. 具有列设置为被视为分配第一个和其固定的宽度。Columns with set to are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated. 2. 具有列设置为其内容调整大小。Columns with set to are sized to their contents. 3. 剩余空间使用的列之间划分设置为。Remaining space is divided among columns with set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置各列的属性时单击。The following code example sets the properties of each column when a is clicked. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 返回指定子控件的列位置。

span.span: The column position of the specified child control, or -1 if the position of is determined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`control`跨两个或多个列，方法将返回最低的列索引。If `control` spans two or more columns, the method will return the lowest column index. 因此，你可以将它用作索引列位置的值是从零开始，通过返回的数组。The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by . 调用此方法`Column`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. 若要获取的实际位置`control`，即使其位置由，调用方法。To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by , call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的所有子控件，为每个控件使用找到的列索引方法。The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the and finds the column index for each control using the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列跨越通常是用于定位的控件时显著高于其对等节点。Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers. 调用此方法`ColumnSpan`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和方法，以便设置的宽度中控制。The following code example uses the and methods to set the width of a control in a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 列和行的位置值是从零开始。The column and row position values are zero based. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的所有单元格位置是循环遍历由给定的行和列和，然后调用方法来检索控件在每个单元格。The following code example enumerates all the cell positions in the by looping through the columns and rows given by and , and then calling the method to retrieve the control at each cell. The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨越行是通常用于定位显著高于其对等方的控件。Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers. 调用此方法`RowSpan`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和方法，以便设置的宽度中控制。The following code example uses the and methods to set the width of a control in a . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#11)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
A indicating the growth scheme.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件通过添加行向下扩展。By default, the control expands downward by adding rows. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试将控件添加到完整控制和的值是，则引发。If an attempt is made to add a control to a full control, and the value of is , then an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的值具体取决于所选属性。The following code example sets the value of the property depending on the selected . 在运行的时，当用户单击标记为的按钮**测试标签**、控件添加到控件。At run time, when the user clicks on the button labeled **Test GrowStyle**, a control is added to the control. 如果控件已满，通过添加行或列，它扩展或它引发异常，具体取决于值。If the control is full, it expands by adding a row or column, or it raises an exception, depending on the value of . summary.span: 获取或设置表中行的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.
The number of rows in the control.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以同时指定和属性与已知的和固定大量的单元格的布局。You can specify both the and the properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells. 你还可以指定一个属性或其他如果你希望你的布局不断增长中的单元格的数目假定属性允许这种增长。You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the property allows for such growth. 如果值为 0，面板会通过添加行，并且如果的值为 0，面板会通过添加列。If the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns. 指定使用的面板增长属性优于设置或为 0，但是。Specifying panel growth with the property is preferred to setting or to 0, however. 控件可以添加或删除从表使用属性。Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowStyles As TableLayoutRowStyleCollection

summary.span: 获取 的行样式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of row styles for the .

value.span: 包含 控件中每行的 的 。

span.span: A containing a for each row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问特定行的样式属性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific rows. 你可以使用的成员类来设置各行的特性表中。You can use members of the class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table. 当控件排列其行时，它将优先级分配给每个按以下顺序：When the control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each in the following order: 1. 与行设置为被视为分配第一个和其固定的高度。Rows with set to are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated. 2. 与行设置为其内容调整大小。Rows with set to are sized to their contents. 3. 剩余空间使用的行中划分设置为。Remaining space is divided among rows with set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的每个属性时行单击。The following code example sets the properties of each row when a is clicked. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#9)]

span.span: The control to move to another column.
The column to which control will be moved.

summary.span: 设置指定子控件的列位置。

span.span: Sets the column position of the specified child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将控件移到另一个列中。The method moves the control to another column in the . 行和列具有从零开始的索引。The columns and rows have zero-based indexes. 将列位置设置为-1，则指定此控件将流至第一个空单元格。Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell. 此方法重新表布局应用到中的所有控件。This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the . 调用此方法`Column`属性，该面板在设计时将添加到其子控件属性。This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来交换两个控件中包含控件。The following code example uses the method to swap two controls contained within a control. 该示例假定具有至少两个行控件。The example assumes a control with at least two rows. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#12)]
